                 byte[] msg,
                 java.lang.String senderAddress,

        Parameters:
        type - type of message
        msg - message to be sent in a byte array
        senderAddress - address (ip) to send
        senderPort - port to send

        Parameters:

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the connection for the 3 channels previously configured. This method will start the connection handler.

      • createChannel

        public void createChannel(Sockets s,
                          java.lang.String ip,
                          java.lang.String port)
        Creates a new channel. The channel initializes the socket.
        Parameters:
        s - Type of Channel (MC, MDB, MDR)
        ip - IP of the channel
        port - Port of the channel

      • decNumberThreads

        public void decNumberThreads()
        For each request a new thread is created and when it ends the count needs to be updated. So, it's necessary to keep track of them with precaution.

      • setId

        public void setId(java.lang.String id1)

      • sameId

        public boolean sameId(java.lang.String id1)
        Compare the id of the peer with the given id. This method is thread safe
        Parameters:
        id1 - id to be compared
        Returns:
        true if the ids are the same, false otherwise

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.String[] args)
        Initiates the deletion protocol for the file
        Parameters:
        args - file name

      • reclaim

        public void reclaim(java.lang.String[] args)
        Initiates the reclaim protocol
        Parameters:
        args - size (in bytes) to save

      • restore

        public void restore(java.lang.String[] args,
                    boolean enhancement)
        Initiates the restore protocol
        Parameters:
        args - name of the file
        enhancement - if true then the enhancement is used, otherwise it's not used

      • startRestoreEnhancement

        public void startRestoreEnhancement()
        Initializes the channel for the restore enhancement
